name: Bendigo Bank (2015 mobile site)
description:
Adapts the new Bendigo Bank mobile site for desktop use.

Includes modifications to: activity, contacts, upcoming, messages.
additional_info:
- split payee and amount so amounts line up right aligned
- condense lists for legibility
- use a monospace font for amounts
- de-emphasize generic icons
- increase font sizes in messages section

This is a pretty quick hack job - no real responsive treatment; it's assumed that the user is on a desktop machine because a browser plugin is required.  Superficial testing only in Chrome and Firefox, should play well in evergreen browsers.
